ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] what weapon? and other questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: Fohut asked: Also, when soloing which do you prefer: Anthem de arms, or Whistling warsong? *** Jonathan s Whistling Warsong.  Though in another two levels
ygData.messageBody:
Fohut asked:
Also, when soloing which do you prefer: Anthem de arms, or Whistling
warsong?

*** Jonathan's Whistling Warsong. Though in another two levels Hymn,
Chords of Dissonance, and Bellow with a stringed instrument starts to
become more effective for soloing. I still use that combo.

Also Also, how hard is it to get that other level 9 song I heard can
only be gotten in Luclin, "Magical Monologue" (of course I'll have
to buy the exp first) so that i can save my Platinum and not have to
buy a magic weapon?

*** Good question. I got to get me that still.

Also Also Also does the bellow that bards get at lvl 12 affect
creatures that can only be hit with magic weapons, and does that song
show you how much dammage you are delivering (whereas the chords of
disonance only say "Large Spider winces" etc)?

*** Bellow is a magic attack, yes. I believe a somewhat recent patch added
the damage done by the song to the text box message. Something like "A
large spider was hit by 9 points of non-melee damage"

Evulia, bard of 18 songs, Tunare
